description:
Eisenwald`s true goal was to play the lullaby at the place the Guild Masters are having their regular meeting! Erigor gets closer and closer to the meeting hall, while Natsu and the others are all trapped in the magic wind wall Erigor set up around the station. At this rate the Guild Masters are in trouble! But just then comes a glimmer of hope in the form of... Lucy?!
Source: crunchyroll
